nodes.title: Support rendering localized errors & exceptions with the template engine
Add webjarsAt and publicAt methods/helpers/extensions to all template engines
Add a UrlBuilder to generate context-aware URLs
Fix urlFor with regex paths and add unit tests to protect against regressions
Allow specification of the application context path in application.propeties
Support message and date/time localization within Freemarker and Jade templates
Create JsonEngine and XmlEngine interfaces, remove Gson from core
Add a bind() builder method for chained response setting
Add a Guice module and demonstration
Bind the controller method early and fail-fast
Do not access RuntimeMode static singleton in PippoSettings
Use final classes with private constructors for constants
Split request entity mapping into two methods to allow entity PATCHing
Add support for the PATCH http method (fixes #6)
Track Pippo version in a classpath resource and add some fun ASCII artwork
changed docs to use lambdas in examples to show shorter code
add support for redirect to route
add route name as first criterion in urlFor
improve accuracy of  web server settings acurate
Add more configurations to Jetty server
Added more configuration options for undertow
Rename csrfToken to _csrf_token to be consistent with other reserved form field names
Add support for single-value, string-encoded lists in ParameterValue collections methods
Add support for `_content_type` and `_content` parameters for RESTful form POSTing
Allow html forms to specify _method which overrides the servlet method
Fix ContentTypeEngine initialization and add pippo-jackson
Allow specifying a non-root Pippo filter or servlet path
move work related to Controller concept in a new module (pippo-controller)
Add Metrics Route Pre- and Post- DispatchListener for status code metrics
RFC: Add a Tjws WebServer implementation
Extract the route processing core from PippoFilter and implement a PippoServlet
Move Initializers from PippoFilter to Application
Add support for naming routes to bring meaningful context to logs
Move ignore paths feature into Router
Use URI to automatically decode %nn encoded url paths
Simplified Flash implementation by eliminating levels
Allow to use a custom session
Strategically use Trace log level to cut down on request cycle noise
Allow TemplateEngine to render a direct string
Implement an 'override' mechanism and System property & Env variable interpolation
Remove the legacy external files feature
Display the bound "message" in the error templates
add support for ALL (request method) - useful for filters
Extracted the logging of unhandled routes to separate method
Fix https://github.com/decebals/pippo/issues/70 to check if not contentt...
Reorganize and document the Response class
Separate the status code convenience methods from the commit action
Allow PippoFilter to auto-commit uncommitted responses
Added templates for all common error status codes for all engines
RFC: Add factories for Request and Response
Add method to remove a Route from the Router
RFC: Add Response.halt() to terminate the RouteHandlerChain
Implement a concrete Error class for passing to ContentTypeEngines
Improve supported Response content types with builder-style setters
Add default XML content type engine based on JAXB
Fix bug in chain handling where the Response is committed half-way through
Add RedirectHandler and TemplateHandler to reduce boilerplate
Relax the validation of HTTP methods on route registration
Add support for enum parameter values
Expose all WebServerSettings to application.properties and add external files path
Allow entities to be automatically instantiated using optional controller annotations
Add a shutdown hook to gracefully terminate on ctrl+c
Fix contextPath definition problem and improve Request & Response context methods
Rename URL methods to URI since they do not contain location information
Add Response methods for setting common status codes & committing the response
Use ContentTypeEngines to optionally process request bodies
Add an optional Java 8+ controller handler to use compiled parameter names
Improve request type mapping and the default controller handler
Add a Metrics module and the most common reporter integrations
Merge AbstractRouteMatcher, DefaultRouteMatcher, and UrlBuilder into DefaultRouter
Content types, merging error handler, merging router
Update to Pebble 1.2.0 with thread-safe locales
Move PippoFilter instantiation from Pippo class to the WebServer implementations (breaking change)
Add possibility to use a singleton Controller
feat(Response): expose method to reset the response
Use gzip compression where it's possible; see #331
Make Pippo class a little bit more expressive
Add SingletonControllerFactory, a possible solution for #324
Reduce DirectoryHandler logging noise for normal IOExceptions
Verify that starting server does not block
Add missing close parens to sample BasicApp
Extract addRoute, GET, POST, ... methods in Routing interface
Isolating Hazelcast instance for each test
Restructuring of the hierarchy of modules
multiple code improvements: squid:S1068, squid:S1854, squid:S1192, squid:S00115, squid:UselessParenthesesCheck
multiple code improvements: squid:S1118, squid:S00117, squid:S1197, squid:CommentedOutCodeLine, squid:S00122, squid:S2092, squid:S00115
multiple code improvements: squid:S1068, squid:ClassVariableVisibilityCheck, squid:S2131, squid:S1192, squid:S1488, squid:S1066, squid:S1596, squid:S1170
Use the trustStore only when client authentication is enabled
fixed the bug when underline in path parameter name
use Java7 Regex Named Groups fixed PathRegexBuilder wrong pathParameter bug
Stop manually maintaining all META-INF/services files
Stop manually maintaining pippo-pebble META-INF/services files
Transparently support Java 8 -parameters names for controllers
Implement DirectoryResourceHandler for serving external directories
Gracefully handle parameter values composed of whitespace
use standard java service loader mechanism via ServiceLocator and remove pippo.properties files
Allow use of UTF-8 in path parameter expressions
Add method to finalize the Response and return the raw output stream
Add convenience methods for setting date headers
Fix CSRF guard failure on content-types with specified charsets
remove "extends Assert" from each existent Test class
ParameterValue.toXYZ() returns Object instead of primitive got numeric, boolean, chart
fix #196 - activate war profile in pippo-demo by property packaging.type=war
a very basic (without validation) pippo-knockoutjs demo
Register Json, Xml, and Yaml engines with pippo-jackson
Fix alias substitution in webjars paths
Change Webjars path aliasing to only use the artifactId
Allow specification of Accept-Type by appending a registered suffix to the request path
Split JAXB engine into a separate module
Serialize and deserialize dates & times using ISO8601 in Jackson
Serialize and deserialize dates & times using ISO8601 in FastJSON
Serialize and deserialize date, time, and datetime using ISO8601 in Gson
add entries to cache map only on PROD mode
Initial commit (and working only for Gson)
Add possibility to disable suffix for Pebble loader
PippoRule: Make methods public: startPippo and stopPippo
ContentTypeEngines: Change the log level from debug to info
Handle non-empty Path and empty method path
Fix Character Encoding/Content-Length Bug in Response.commit(CharSequence)
chore: upgrade fastjson to latest version
Issue #495 - do not call channel.resumeReceives() until handler.onOpen() called
Added a constructor and convenience methods for setting route names d…
Issue #484 - Use undertow channel tasks to remove closed/broken connections
Issue #480 - Use WebSockets.sendClose to send close code/reason
feat(gzip): send gzip response when Accept-Encoding:* is present
feat: add wrapper method to get header names
Made SessionData an interface, and introduced DefaultSessionData
fix(undertow): resolve undertow settings not getting picked
Closing the writer will close the stream as well. Fix for #455.
feat: upgrade jackson to latest version
feat: upgrade guice to latest version
The Settings File is now read with UTF-8 as the default encoding.
Add Handlers class as a factory for common RouteHandler
FileItem's input stream is closed properly now
ControllerRegistry: fix the build of paths and add tests
Convert to float, double and BigDecimal according Locale
Remove braces from start and end in getStrings
Return immutable Set when toSet() is called
Add path params in websocket uri
Fix #385 - JedisFactory not initializing redis URI
Handle keystore paths that are relative to Classpath
Support configuring the Jackson Object Mapper
